Package ohos.agp.render

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Picture

  • public class Picture
extends Object
    Records drawing calls and then draw objects by playing the calls back to Canvas through Canvas#drawPicture.

    The recorded drawing calls can be played back via Canvas#drawPicture. Drawing objects using a Picture instance can be faster than calling equivalent methods. This approach is applicable to the scenario where some objects need to be drawn for multiple times.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Detail

      • beginRecording

        public Canvas beginRecording​(int width,
                             int height)
        Starts recording.

        After you call this method, a Canvas instance used for recording drawing operations will be returned. This method must be used together with Picture#endRecording.

        Parameters:
        width - Indicates the width of the picture whose coordinate in the upper left corner starts from (0,0). The drawing that exceeds the width may or may not be drawn.
        height - Indicates the height of the picture whose coordinate in the upper left corner starts from (0,0). The drawing that exceeds the height may or may not be drawn.
        Returns:
        Returns a Canvas instance that records drawing calls. All drawings in the Canvas are stored in this Picture.
        Since:
        3

      • endRecording

        public void endRecording​()
        Ends recording.

        All recording operations must start with beginRecording(int, int) and end with endRecording().

        Since:
        3

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth​()
        Obtains the width of this picture.
        Returns:
        Returns the width of this picture.
        Since:
        3

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight​()
        Obtains the height of this picture.
        Returns:
        Returns the height of this picture.
        Since:
        3

      • draw

        public void draw​(Canvas canvas)
        Draws the object on the specified canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Indicates the canvas.
        Since:
        5
